dyDataHandler Include a dygraph data handler

#### Description

Include a dygraph data handler

#### Usage
<pre><code>

dyDataHandler(dygraph, name, path, version = "1.0")

<code><pre>
#### Arguments

* ``dygraph``: Dygraph to add data handler to
* ``name``: Name of data handler
* path Path to data handler JavaScript file
* version Data handler version (e.g. version of package which provides the data handler)

#### Value

A dygraph with the specified data handler enabled.
